td.content: s:patient presents with 2 months history of moderate shortness of breath and Respiratory. she is a 49 yr old F human resources specialist. she states she has never smoked a cigarette in her life she denies drinking alcohol o:Height 62 in, Weight 120 lbs, Temperature 98.4 F, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 16, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs a:Shortness of Breath p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to pulmonary disease.
